about.message: Made with ❤️ in the United States.
about.nominatim_1: Location Search and Geocoding is provided by
about.nominatim_2: Their data is liscensed under the ODbL license.
about.other_attributions: Additional attributions can be found in the README file.
about.generic_attributions: Login to AdventureLog to view attributions for enabled integrations and services.

home.hero_1: Discover the World's Most Thrilling Adventures
home.hero_2: Discover and plan your next adventure with AdventureLog. Explore breathtaking destinations, create custom itineraries, and stay connected on the go.
home.desc_1: Discover, Plan, and Explore with Ease
home.desc_2: AdventureLog is designed to simplify your journey, providing you with the tools and resources to plan, pack, and navigate your next unforgettable adventure.
home.feature_1_desc: Keep track of your adventures with a personalized travel log and share your experiences with friends and family.
home.feature_2_desc: Easily create custom itineraries and get a day-by-day breakdown of your trip.
home.feature_3_desc: View your travels throughout the world with an interactive map and explore new destinations.

adventures.adventure_delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this adventure? This action cannot be undone.
adventures.checklist_delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this checklist? This action cannot be undone.
adventures.note_delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this note? This action cannot be undone.
adventures.transportation_delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this transportation? This action cannot be undone.
adventures.lodging_delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this lodging location? This action cannot be undone.
adventures.not_found_desc: The adventure you were looking for could not be found. Please try a different adventure or check back later.
adventures.name: Name
adventures.no_linkable_adventures: No adventures found that can be linked to this collection.
adventures.collection_no_start_end_date: Adding a start and end date to the collection will unlock itinerary planning features in the collection page.
adventures.wiki_desc: Pulls excerpt from Wikipedia article matching the name of the adventure.
adventures.all_adventures_already_linked: All adventures are already linked to this collection.
adventures.no_collections_found: No collections found to add this adventure to.
adventures.create_collection_first: Create a collection first to organize your adventures and memories.
adventures.delete_collection_warning: Are you sure you want to delete this collection? This action cannot be undone.
adventures.no_image_url: No image found at that URL.
adventures.start_before_end_error: Start date must be before end date
adventures.no_adventures_to_recommendations: No adventures found. Add at least one adventure to get recommendations.
adventures.adventure_not_found: There are no adventures to display. Add some using the plus button at the bottom right or try changing filters!
adventures.no_adventures_message: Start documenting your adventures and planning new ones. Every journey has a story worth telling.
adventures.visited_region_check_desc: By selecting this, the server will check all of your visited adventures and mark the regions they are located in as visited in world travel.
adventures.update_visited_regions_disclaimer: This may take a while depending on the number of adventures you have visited.
adventures.nothing_planned: Nothing planned for this day. Enjoy the journey!
adventures.will_be_marked: will be marked as visited once the adventure is saved.
adventures.no_ordered_items: Add items with dates to the collection to see them here.
adventures.finding_recommendations: Discovering hidden gems for your next adventure
adventures.gpx_tip: Upload GPX files to attachments to view them on the map!

worldtravel.no_countries_found_desc: Try adjusting your search terms or filters to find the countries you're looking for.
worldtravel.region_failed_visited: Failed to mark region as visited
worldtravel.no_country_data_available_desc: Please check the documentation for updating region data.

auth.login_error: Unable to login with the provided credentials.
auth.public_tooltip: With a public profile, users can share collections with you and view your profile on the users page.
auth.or_3rd_party: Or login with a third-party service

users.no_users_found: No users found with public profiles.

settings.no_verified_email_warning: You must have a verified email address to enable two-factor authentication.
settings.social_auth_desc_1: Manage social login options and password settings
settings.email_management_desc: Manage your email addresses and verification status
settings.possible_reset: If the email address you provided is associated with an account, you will receive an email with instructions to reset your password!
settings.join_discord_desc: to share your own photos. Post them in the #travel-share channel.
settings.password_change_lopout_warning: You will be logged out after changing your password.
settings.generic_error: An error occurred while processing your request.
settings.verify_email_error: Error verifying email. Try again in a few minutes.
settings.mfa_desc: Add an extra layer of security to your account
settings.recovery_codes_desc: These are your recovery codes. Keep them safe. You will not be able to see them again.
settings.reset_session_error: Please logout and back in to refresh your session and try again.
settings.email_verified_success: Your email has been verified. You can now log in.
settings.email_verified_erorr_desc: Your email could not be verified. Please try again.
settings.access_restricted_desc: Administrative features are only available to staff members.
settings.social_auth_desc: Enable or disable social and OIDC authentication providers for your account. These connections allow you to sign in with self hosted authentication identity providers like Authentik or 3rd party providers like GitHub.
settings.social_auth_desc_2: These settings are managed in the AdventureLog server and must be manually enabled by the administrator.
settings.password_disable_warning: Currently, password authentication is disabled. Login via a social or OIDC provider is required.
settings.password_disabled_error: Error disabling password authentication. Make sure a social or OIDC provider is linked to your account.
settings.integrations_desc: Connect external services to enhance your experience
settings.profile_info_desc: Update your personal details and profile picture
settings.public_profile_desc: Make your profile visible to other users
settings.pass_change_desc: Update your account password for better security

collection.create_first: Create your first collection to organize your adventures and memories.
collection.make_sure_public: Make sure your profile is public so others can share with you.
collection.try_different_search: Try a different search or filter.

notes.note_public: This note is public because it is in a public collection.

checklist.checklist_public: This checklist is public because it is in a public collection.

map.place_marker_desc: Click on the map to place a marker, or add an adventure without location.

share.share_desc: Share this collection with other users.
share.no_shared_found: No collections found that are shared with you.
share.set_public: In order to allow users to share with you, you need your profile set to public.

profile.your_journey_at_a_glance: Your adventure journey at a glance
profile.no_shared_adventures: This user hasn't shared any public adventures yet.
profile.no_shared_collections: This user hasn't shared any public collections yet.

categories.update_after_refresh: The adventure cards will be updated once you refresh the page.

dashboard.add_some: Why not start planning your next adventure? You can add a new adventure by clicking the button below.
dashboard.document_some_adventures: Start documenting your travels and build your personal adventure map!
dashboard.welcome_text_3: Keep exploring and documenting your travels!

immich.integration_fetch_error: Error fetching data from the Immich integration
immich.api_note: Note: this must be the URL to the Immich API server so it likely ends with /api unless you have a custom config.
immich.immich_integration_desc: Connect your Immich photo management server
immich.localhost_note: Note: localhost will most likely not work unless you have setup docker networks accordingly. It is recommended to use the IP address of the server or the domain name.
immich.need_help: Need help setting this up? Check out the
immich.copy_locally_desc: Copy images to the server for offline access. Uses more disk space.
immich.integration_already_exists: An Immich integration already exists. You can only have one integration at a time.
immich.integration_not_found: Immich integration not found. Please create a new integration.
immich.validation_error: An error occurred while validating the Immich integration. Please check your server URL and API key.
immich.network_error: Network error while connecting to the Immich server. Please check your connection and try again.

google_maps.google_maps_integration_desc: Connect your Google Maps account to get high-quality location search results and recommendations.
